pages.text: A $(item)Staff/$ is my entry into casting _Hexes. By holding it and pressing $(thing)$(k:use)/$, I start casting a _Hex, and can click and drag to draw patterns.$(br2)It's little more than a chunk of _media on the end of a stick, for that's all that is needed.
$(italic)Don't fight; flame, light; ignite; burn bright./$
